      • isChunkVisible

        public static boolean isChunkVisible(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                     org.bukkit.Chunk chunk)
        Checks whether a given chunk is visible to the client of a player. This actually checks whether the chunk data had been sent, it doesn't do a distance check.
        Parameters:
        player - to check
        chunk - to check
        Returns:
        True if the chunk is visible to the player, False if not

      • isChunkVisible

        public static boolean isChunkVisible(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                     int chunkX,
                     int chunkZ)
        Checks whether a given chunk is visible to the client of a player. This actually checks whether the chunk data had been sent, it doesn't do a distance check.
        Parameters:
        player - to check
        chunkX - of the chunk to check
        chunkZ - of the chunk to check
        Returns:
        True if the chunk is visible to the player, False if not

      • isChunkEntered

        public static boolean isChunkEntered(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                     int chunkX,
                     int chunkZ)
        Checks whether a given chunk has been 'entered' by a player. An entered chunk is liable for updates to the client. Note that this does not check whether the chunk is actually sent.
        Parameters:
        player - to check
        chunkX - of the chunk to check
        chunkZ - of the chunk to check
        Returns:
        True if the player entered the chunk, False if not

      • isChunkEntered

        public static boolean isChunkEntered(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                     org.bukkit.Chunk chunk)
        Checks whether a given chunk has been 'entered' by a player. An entered chunk is liable for updates to the client. Note that this does not check whether the chunk is actually sent.
        Parameters:
        player - to check
        chunk - to check
        Returns:
        True if the player entered the chunk, False if not
